## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have removed any debug/console logs

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested on a physical device (if available)
- [ ] I have tested on the simulator
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the README.md if needed
- [ ] I have added DocC comments for new public APIs
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md (if applicable)

### Git

- [ ] My commits are logical and well-described
- [ ] I have rebased my branch on the latest main
- [ ] There are no merge conflicts
- [ ] I have resolved all review comments (if resubmitting)
